name: bj-speiv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)

|- wex(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)
-| w1
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| w1
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ spei with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 (neither ~ ax-7 nor ~ ax-12 ). (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
